contest-event.event-date:
July 1, 2012 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Best Principal Cornet: Jamie Smith (Hammonds Saltaire) Best Contest March: Marsden Silver Best Hymn Tune: Marsden Silver Best Soloist Of The Day: Adam Turner, Euphonium, Drighlington Best Band Road March: Hammonds Saltaire Best Trombones on Road March: Marsden Silver Best Soprano: Marsden Silver Best 4th Section Hymn Tune: Clifton & Lightcliffe B Deportment: Kirbymoorside Best 1st Section: Drighlington Best 2nd Section: The Lindley Band Best 3rd Section: Boarshurst Silver Best 4th Section: Dobcross Youth Youth Deportment: Shirland Training Best Unregistered Band: Thurlestone Youngest Player: Ben Warner, 9 (Sellers International Youth) Best Soloist Youth: Jamie Smith, Cornet (Sellers International Youth)
Youth Contest results: 1st Sellers International Youth 2nd Elland Youth 3rd Shirland Welfare Training 4th Gawthorpe Brass 85 Youth
July 1, 2012, 9:15 p.m. April 8, 2016, 10:42 a.m.
